name: .CLKP File Extension
summary: Learn about .CLKP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Object palette file used by Clicker, a literacy tool used by teachers to create curriculum resources tailored to student needs; contains a color palette for objects used by a Clicker Set.

content: Color palettes allow users to customize and save their favorite solid colors, color blends, and patterns. Color palettes can be viewed when clicking the paint brush icon when modifying a Clicker Set.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
